titles.title: King David Danced Before The Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
King David danced before the Lord.
King David danced before the Lord.
King David danced before the Lord.
On his kinfolks it was hard
For all our sins are taken away.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The praisers go before the sword. (3x)
For the battle is the Lord's,
And all my sins are taken away.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
The ark is coming down the road. (3x)
Coming back to its abode,
And all my sins are taken away.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Now all my sins are taken away. (3x)
And I'm rejoicing night and day
For all my sins are taken away.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
I'm not going to listen to any more lies. (3x)
There's no room for compromise
For all my sins are taken away.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
There's only room for the Word of the Lord. (3x)
And the cutting away of the sword,
For all my sins are taken away.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
And now I walk in liberty. (3x)
For the devil has no hold on me,
All my sins are taken away.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
And now I walk to set others free. (3x)
For my Lord has delivered me,
And all our sins are taken away.
